title: MD
biography: Ponnusamy Venugopal was a member of the 15th Lok Sabha of India. He represented the Tiruvallur constituency of Tamil Nadu and is a member of the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam political party.
aiSummary: P. Venugopal is a heart transplant surgery specialist with an H-index of 110 at AIIMS (Faculty). Has been published in Journal of Molecular and Cellular Cardiology, Journal of Cellular and Molecular Medicine, Molecular and Cellular Biochemistry. Based in India.
education: AIIMSFirst successful heart transplant in India
